name: Howl of Iron
description:
Tonight we hunt
Howl of Iron is a 3rd Person Action Adventure title with a focus of hunting your enemies. The city offers several paths and heights to move and attack. Travel through the streets of steamfall your way stalking the enemies that scatter the streets and rooftops of the buildings, fighting them melee, avoiding their powerful shots to avoid being defeated, using your combos to finish them off.

Death from above
Explore back-to back each section to find the patrols’ weak spots. Climb buildings to attack from above and escape unfavorable encounters.
Execute unaware enemies. combine light and heavy slashes for greater effect while you dash through their formation.

Make them fear you
Use your thundering howl to make your adversaries lose their composure, opening them for a quick finishing blow.
